name: Weekly Comic List
body:
This project reads the new comic feeds from www.comiclist.com, allows you to store the comics on your pull list,
and shows you on a per-week basis what comics you should expect. It also lets you browse available comics on a
weekly basis, using historical lists. 

You can download and run the application from here:
[https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adamcsills/ComicList/master/ClickOnce/setup.exe](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adamcsills/ComicList/master/ClickOnce/setup.exe)

Note that Internet Explorer may catch the file with the Smart Screen Filter. This is because the file is brand new and I'm the only one who's run it before.

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adamcsills/ComicList/master/ClickOnce/screenshot.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
